sentence.text: quaternary ammonium group transport patients have some degree of (kypho)scoliosis, short stature and suffer from respiratory impairment due to the reduced size of their thoracic cage.

Therefore, it seems plausible that mutations in biological_process are associated with a different (novel) subtype of quaternary ammonium group transport mainly characterized by severe rib anomalies but lacking clear segmentation defects of the vertebral bodies
